review: Not too happy with this. It's fine for about 30 minutes on Netflix, then it's the circle of doom at 25% loading and will not load any further. It's not the Wi-Fi router. When using the RGB cord and running off of the laptop, Netflix is absolutely fine. Sooooooo, not too sure about this little tool.

review: so far so good, waiting for the service to grow. For a newer streaming service it's off to a great start.

review: I am an Amazon Prime member, so this has been a great addition for me.  I have access to so many wonderful programs with my Prime membership.  Can't imagine why it took me so long to make this purchase.
